detail: The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.
benefit: Within the broader CSO organization, the Incentives and Integrity team plays a key role in influencing GCS business rhythms by designing incentives, setting productivity goals, encouraging a culture of ethical selling, and deploying Google policies in a GCS-centric way.
requirement: Probationary period: 02 month, Age: 23 - 35

detail: Connect pipes from tank trucks to the milk receiver and tanks to carry out the import / export of milk into production. Operating the whole Raw Milk receiving system, CIP system, Pasteurization system. Check the condition of the milk receiving device, heat exchanger, milk tank and related equipment according to the work instructions. Monitor the temperature and quality of semi-finished milk during processing.
benefit:
Salary bonus of 13 and 14 months. 
Considering annual salary increase according to work evaluation results.
Birthday allowance, filial piety, joy ... Bonuses on holidays and New Year.
requirement: Graduated from a college in food technology, biology, chemistry, electricity, automation, mechanical ... Have skills in working independently and in group coordination. Candidates who know a foreign language (English) are an advantage
otherInfo:
WHAT WILL YOU DO ?
• Responsible for consulting, introducing products, recording orders, selling TH's brands at points of sale on the line in charge.
• Taking care and creating relationships with customers, ensuring the maintenance of old customers and developing new customers to fulfill sales targets
• Arrange and display products at the point of sale
• Make sales reports according to the Company's regulations
• Record and resolve product and goods related problems
• Sales-related tasks as required by the Supervisor

• Preferably 1.5 to 3 years of working experience in Data Analyst
• Experience with using SQL queries for data extraction and manipulation.
• Willingness to learn new thing (R, Python) and solving problem using cutting edge technology (BigQuery).

detail: Customer service. Ensure work shop hygiene. Support work in the counter and lobby as arranged by the Store Manager.Mastering the operating process and company rules, ensuring the correct implementation of the working process at the store. Responsible for the main work shift. Directly handle arising problems, customer inquiries, or guide employees to handle them thoroughly in order to maintain service quality during the work shift.
benefit: Work in a professional service environment. To learn, train and develop skills of dispensing & cashier (if desired). Opportunities for rapid promotion to managerial positions with new stores opening every week. Preferential programs for TCH employees.
requirement: Pupils and students of 18 years or older are able to work from 24 hours a week or more (equivalent to 4-5 work shifts / week, 5-6 hours each shift). Passionate & want to accumulate experience working in the F&B service industry in the fields (serving customers, preparing) .Good health, diligence, proactive at work
otherInfo:
• Over 3 years working experience in the international hotel or high-end restaurants
• Over 1 years working experience required
• Must have considerable knowledge of food preparation methods and techniques
• Oversee facility and equipment in the responsible areas
• Must be able to work with minimal supervision, handle a fast-paced, busy, and somewhat stressful environment, and work under pressure and meet deadlines with
• particular attention to detail
• Ability to communicate fluently in English

otherInfo:
• Category Management
• Monitor and analyze the category performance in a number of assortments, new products, sales, profit then develop and implement action plans to grow the category based on strategy.
• Conduct frequent market research/ study reports (AC Nielson/ IQVIA) for new products and pricing…. to ensure range selection meets customer needs on a weekly basis.
• Define strategy and action plans to meet sales and profit
• Develop Exclusive/ Direct Import product sourcing
• Ensure the stock availability at the store through setting up min-max and arrange the distribution for all listed products2. Supplier Management
• Source more suppliers and new products following the company’s strategy on category growth and the company’s policy
• Negotiate with suppliers on the trading terms and trade marketing incomes
• Work daily with suppliers in terms of stock/pricing/promotion/branding.3. Promotion (not applying for Medicine)
• Deal with supplier for the best promotion supports based on the promotion schedule and plan
• Work with the Supply Chain team to make sure sufficient stocks during the promotion time
• Set up min-max for items in the promotion

detail: You will be responsible for the day-to-day management and smooth operation of various digital projects, including site launches, online tools, web applications, mobile apps and CRM application and support data collection, tagging, reporting and analysis of digital channels.    For this position, we expect you to be a tech-savvy professional with an in-depth understanding of how technology can help us achieve our business goals.
benefit: Demonstrate understanding of digital content workflows, post-production applications, and media technology, finding ways to apply industry best practices to the company. Willingness to learn business tools and technology to better understand needs, requirements, workflows and processes.

detail: Management and completion of audit plan: Identify key risks and Build the periodic audit plan to ensure all of internal team are compliant with the company's policy, SOPs and requirements, actively detect the incorrect process & actions. Monitor and provide advice to minimize risk resulting from poor internal controls. Follow-up of audit findings and develop action plans. Identifies control gaps and opportunities for improvement. Build the metrics to track the performance and present the rate of compliance and the impact of non-compliant risk to business. Develop Internal Control training materials and support training in the process compliance training to all internal departments
benefit: Laptop, Insurance mode, Allowance, Uniform, Bonus mode, Health care, Salary increase, Annual leave, Sports club
requirement: 2-5 years of relevant audit and management experience.Strong auditing and analytical skills, logical thinking and detailed driven. Excellent knowledge of risk assessment, controlling and business processes.
otherInfo:
• Fluent Vietnamese and English speaking & writing skill
• High level of commitment and integrity.
• Work well under pressure and in a fast paced and dynamic environment, meet milestones within time, cost and quality constraints.

detail: Responsible for providing all guests with customized, personal attention, anticipating guests needs, escorting or directing guests to the appropriate service area (locker room, massage area, nail stations, fitness area, etc.)/ Providing information about Spa services , advising and assisting customers and directing guests to the right areas (changing rooms, treatment rooms, manicure areas, gyms…) The ability to graciously respond to guests is essential. Must show maturity in making decisions and Advising the guest when not under supervision of Spa Management necessary, when there is no supervision by management.
benefit: Insurance, Shuttle bus, Uniform, Health care, Training, Salary increase, Annual leave
requirement:
Contact housekeeping or engineering with cleaning requests or maintenance requests/ Work with relevant department to clean and maintain spa facilities.Process no-show and late cancellation billing, as required/ Carry out procedures about guests who do not show up, arrive late, or cancel appointments.Maintain a cash bank with appropriate change, balance at the end of each shift/ Hand over cash before and after the shift.Maintain reception areas and desk cleanliness at all times, practice a “clean as you go” approach to the work areas/ Keeping the work area clean.Assist therapist with guest relations and scheduling whenever necessary/ Assist technical staff in customer relations and assign schedules whenever necessary necessary.Assist the retail store with sales and posting charges whenever necessary/ Responsible for the sales of the retail spa area.
Must be comfortable answering questions and use proper telephone etiquette at all times/ Answer questions over the phone in a professional manner.Maintain a professional appearance at all times, adhere to departmental grooming standards and dress in full uniform at all times/ Always maintain a neat and tidy appearance suitable for the spa environment.Practice professionalism in every situation with co-workers, guests and management, treating each person with respect and integrity/Always be professional in all situations with colleagues , guest and manager.
otherInfo:
• Maintain positive guest relations at all times
• Maintain the confidentiality policy for all spa guests
• Maintain proper record of guest history and preferences.
• Maintain and practice all safety procedures and protocols.
• Handle emergency situations with urgency and discretion.

detail: Surveying and measuring actual works. Implementation and visualization of architectural space ideas, interior spaces.
benefit: According to the labor agreement.
